thread.title: KALISI Cosmetics releases new product to repair years worth of eyelash damage
thread.title_full: KALISI Cosmetics releases new product to repair years worth of eyelash damage | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: KALISI Cosmetics releases new product to repair years worth of eyelash damage
text:
(MENAFN Press) Los Angeles California (PRBuzz) Aug. 25 2015 – It’s not unusual for women to complain of brittle and thinning eyelashes that seem to fall out easier and easier over time. While it’s a common problem it’s not one that women appreciate and they are therefore constantly looking for ways to fix the issue. What happens is that they add even more mascara to their lashes to bulk them up use eyelash curlers to make them more defined apply and even tint their eyelashes to make them more noticeable.
Each of these “solutions” will certainly offer a short-term fix but while their eyelashes look good at the moment the fact is that each of these options is causing more harm and stress to their lashes that will continue to build over time. It’s really a big circle so how does one get out of it?
Enter in the brand new from KALISI Cosmetics called SkyHigh Lashes which claims to be able to repair years’ worth of stress and damage that has occurred to eyelashes and even eyebrows. This is an all-natural product that uses plant-based extracts to moisturize the area and promote growth. Unlike the above mentioned “fixes” this one is a long-term solution that isn’t harming lashes in any way. Because the is made from all-natural ingredients it’s safe for all ages all skin types and even contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
The company went about creating the product in a very scientific manner and with that said the went through a clinical study in 2014. The results of the study showed that after eight weeks of continuous use the eyelash growth enhancer was able to increase the fullness and thickness by 75%.
###
About KALISI Cosmetics
KALISI Cosmetics is dedicated to providing all natural beauty products and solutions for women of all ages. These products are designed to effectively enhance and take your beauty to the next level in safe and healthy ways.
